issue.title: [Format] Consolidate specification documents and improve clarity for new implementation authors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1789](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1789). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/1296

I believe the specification documents Layout.md, Metadata.md, and IPC.md would benefit from being consolidated into a single Markdown document that would be sufficient (along with the Flatbuffers schemas) to create a complete Arrow implementation capable of reading and writing the binary format

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1789?focusedCommentId=16763341) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Given the size of the documents involved I'm going to try create some sub-issues to make this easier to review.
